title: (inserted by section 6 of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1970 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1970 (Section 
67E) (Prescription of further age to whom contraceptive services will be made 
available without charge) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 January 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1970 (section 67e) (prescription age contraceptive service made available without charge) regulation 2022 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 january 2023

title: (inserted by section 6 of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act
heading: 2. The age range specified in the Schedule to this Regulation is prescribed
text_raw:
2. The age range specified in the Schedule to this Regulation is prescribed 
for the purposes of subsection (1)(b) and subsection (4) of section 67E of the 
Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970) (inserted by section 6 of the Health 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act 2022 (No. 20 of 2022)). 

Schedule 

(1) Attained the age of 26 but not yet attained the age of 27. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [675] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [675]

title: (inserted by section 6 of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations are made under the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) 
(No.2) Act 2022. The Regulations provide for the extension of the free 
contraception scheme to women aged 26. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [675] 5
